author: DonGill
body:
This is a work in progress containing the initial draft of the repo readme for PM review.

No other file changes.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Build failures in the branch not related to the changes, but to the outdate baseline.
I'm merging it, because we already spent too much time on it.

In the future, in this case you can **rebase** to the `origin/master` and update the PR.

title: (WIP) Initial draft of repo readme for PM review.
